query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Email marketing team manually creates and tests subject lines, preview text, and CTAs for 12-15 campaigns monthly. Each A/B test requires manual setup, monitoring, and analysis. Testing is limited to 2-3 variations due to time constraints, missing optimization opportunities. Campaign performance analysis takes 4-6 hours per campaign.',
  aiApproach = 'Implement AI-powered email optimization platform that automatically generates and tests multiple subject line variations (8-10 per campaign), preview text, send time optimization, and personalized content blocks. Machine learning analyzes historical campaign data to predict winning variations and automatically deploys best performers.',
  primaryUsers = 'Email Marketing Manager, Marketing Automation Specialist, CRM Marketing Team (3 people)',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Manually write 2-3 subject line variations (1 hr) 2) Set up A/B test in ESP (45 min) 3) Monitor test performance (30 min) 4) Manually analyze results and select winner (1 hr) 5) Deploy winning version (15 min) 6) Post-campaign analysis (2 hrs). Total: 5.5 hours per campaign',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) Input campaign goals and key message (15 min) 2) AI generates 10 subject line variations with predicted performance (automated) 3) Review and approve test setup (30 min) 4) AI automatically tests, selects winner, and deploys (automated) 5) Review AI-generated insights report (30 min). Total: 1.25 hours per campaign',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual A/B test setup and analysis, enables testing of more variations simultaneously, provides predictive insights for faster decision-making, scales testing across all campaigns',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce A/B testing time from 5.5 to 1.25 hours per campaign (77% reduction), increase email open rates by 18%, improve click-through rates by 22%, test 4x more variations per campaign',
  processOwner = 'Email Marketing Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Email Marketing", "Marketing Automation", "CRM Marketing", "Data Analytics"]',
  primaryMetric = 'revenue_increase',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 22% avg open rate, 3.1% avg CTR, 2-3 variations tested per campaign, 5.5 hours per campaign',
  successCriteria = '26% open rate, 3.8% CTR, 8-10 variations tested per campaign, 1.25 hours per campaign, $150K incremental revenue from improved performance',
  measurementMethod = 'ESP analytics (open rate, CTR, conversion rate), time tracking, revenue attribution modeling',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'high',
  brandDifferentiation = 'medium',
  operationalExcellence = 'high',
  impactScale = 'department',
  impactBenefitType = 'Revenue increase, time savings, improved campaign performance',
  impactFinancialReturn = 150000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'low',
  feasibilityTimeline = '6-8 weeks',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'ESP API integration, historical campaign data export, marketing automation platform compatibility'
WHERE id = 2;
command:

  problemStatement = 'Email marketing team manually creates and tests subject lines, preview text, and CTAs for 12-15 campaigns monthly. Each A/B test requires manual setup, monitoring, and analysis.
